Posts.Content:
I am 38 years old in the past I had breast lumps which were removed. I get my yearly mammograms and ultrasounds. In the past I was Dx with fiberorcyistoris . I had a yearly mammogram then two days letter I recieved a letter from the radiologist stating I needed to redo my mammo because it was in conclusive and I also got an ultrasound. I had both done last Thursday and I was called back from the dr office stating I needed to see the dr about
 my results. Dr stated I needed a biopsy but not to worry. I am really scared and I am freaking out.. Anyone have good advise?
Posts.Title: (No Subject)

Posts.Content: Thank u so much.. I have my biopsies on Wed @9:30am. I am just so scared. I have my baby son who is 10months old. A son who's 14 and a daughter who's 20. I think of all of them. I am afraid. I been praying and I have faith. Thank u for replying I really needed to hear some strong advice back. Thank u
